title: League Of Legends MMO
body: What do you guys think if  Riot released a MMO. I mean they have Runeterra that can be used as a map, they have over 140 champions that they can use as heroes (not all have to be used), and they've been recently changing some of the champions lore so the champ will also have a backstory. Who wouldn't play an MMO where there's your favorite champions that you can play as.  They can use regions like Ionia, Noxus etc..  and also have clans/guilds. I think  that if Riot came out with a new game, it should be an MMO revolving around LoL.

replies.body:
Would love that.
Let me be a young inventor from Piltover, building his own hextech devices!

________________________

And the possibilities would be endless and so awesome...
Imagine if you could pick the Void as your faction and instead of the classic MMO, you play something like Evolve!
You start as a Void larvae and have to kill small creatures in the Void environment to get "bio mass".

This bio mass allows you to evolve your creature with different alternatives. After reaching a critical point in biomass, you are allowed to enter Void portals and go to Runeterra. Here is where the PVP begins.

You are a strong Void creature and enter Runeterra in specific areas. You can just enter regions of a specific level, so you won't instagib any new players, of course. Every passenger is allowed to hunt and kill you. Killing other players gives you more biomass for your evolution. If the players kill you, they get good reward in loot.
